content.rendered:
Directed by Karan Johar.

Written by Karan Johar. Niranjan Iyengar.

Cast Ranbir Kapoor(Ayan Sanger). Aishwarya Rai Bachchan(Saba). Anushka Sharma(Alizeh). Fawad Khan(Ali). Lisa Haydon(Lisa D’Souza). Imran Abbas(Dr. Faisal). Pooja Mehta(Bollywood Dance Class Teacher). Cru Fox(Ayan’s Main Bandmembers – Lead Guitarist). Jamil Ahmed(Drummer). Phyl Cashman(Bass Guitarist). Timea Gazdag(Keyboards). Yohan Contractor(Video Recorder). Byron(Ayan’s Additional Bandmembers – Violinists). Yolita(Ayan’s Additional Bandmembers – Violinists). Niccolo(Ayan’s Additional Bandmembers – Violinists). Samara(Ayan’s Additional Bandmembers – Violinists). Carl(Ayan’s Additional Bandmembers – Violinists). Silas(Alice in Wonderland). Leandro(Alice in Wonderland). Alex Gardner(Paramedics). Becky Nixon(Paramedics). Kaushal Kapoor(Alizeh’s Father). Sukanya Dhanda(Alizeh’s Mother). Shweta Singh(Alizeh’s Sisters). Hezal Tyagi(Alizeh’s Sisters). Preena Jhamb(Alizeh’s Sisters) . Farah Ahmed(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer). Lee Kemp(Student). Kaushal Odedra(Trumpet Player). Hiten Patel(Flight Passenger). Chanelle Sadie Paul(Club Back Up Singer). Hawke Wood(Elf (as Emily Wood)). Sofia Abbasi(Posh Restaurant Guest / Nightclubber (uncredited)). Manoj Anand(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer / Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Anushka Arora(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Claire Ashton(French Language Student (uncredited)). Raj Awasti(Bollywood Dancer (uncredited)). Richard Banks(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Susan Baskerville(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Alia Bhatt(DJ at Silent Disco (uncredited)). Kishore Bhatt(Chemo Ward Patient (uncredited)). David Broughton(Airport Passenger (uncredited)). Yulian Caesar(Nightclubber / Stage Crew (uncredited)). Lula Carr(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Randeep Chana(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Tina Chandorkar(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Amrita Deb(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Alya Elouissi(Party attendant (uncredited)). Lobna Futers(Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Taj Gill(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Naman Gupta(Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Kornelia Horvath(Hotel Restaurant Guest (uncredited)). Sharan Hunjan(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Ty Hurley(Nightclubber (uncredited)). Dolly Jagdeo(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Jessica Jane(Hotel Guest (uncredited)). Aneta Kamysz(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Arun Kapur(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Parv Kaur(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dhol Player (uncredited)). Mudassar Saeed Khan(Concert Goer / Resturant Diner (uncredited)). Shah Rukh Khan(Tahir Taliyar Khan (uncredited)). Joelle Koissi(Hotel Restaurant Guest (uncredited)). Mervi Koski(Nightclubber (uncredited)). Alpesh Malaviya(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Preeti Malhotra(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Elizabeth Mannering(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Bharat Mistri(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Harsha Morarji(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Halima Nagori(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Johannes Nendwich(Radfahrer / Passant / Parkbanksitzer (uncredited)). Celina Nessa(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Nafee Sah(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Anil Sanchania(Student (uncredited)). Hitali Shah(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Avinashi Sharma(Party Guest (uncredited)). Vinita Sharma(Bollywood Medley Wedding Dancer (uncredited)). Kabir Singh(Main Band Member (uncredited)). Amanda Smith(Bollywood Dance Class Dancer (uncredited)). Karol Steele(Passer-by (uncredited)). Faith Tarby(Silent Ballroom Dancer (uncredited)). Lora Thomsen(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Matt Townsend(Posh Restaurant Diner (uncredited)). Marina Ungureanu(Concert Rocker (uncredited)). Elena Valdameri(Jazz Club Goer (uncredited)). Dean Weir(The University Lecturer (uncredited)). Sehar Zam(Backup Singer / Wedding Dancer / Concert Goer (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Crispin Buxton. Marijke Desouza. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Ishvinder Maddh. Apoorva Mehta. Andreas Payer. Rohini Tekchandaney.

Production Dharma Productions. Fox STAR Studios.
